interface.name: weston_clock
interface.description:
Facilities for manipulating the value of clocks used by weston.
It can't be stressed enough that these should never ever be used outside of running weston's tests.
These requests may allow clients to do very bad things.

request.name: advance_time
request.description: Advance the fake time by the specified interval.
